website_summaries.verdict: Small camera won't detract from your vehicle's style. Extremely low price for a simple backup camera.
pros: Works on any type of vehicle, including RVs
Night vision range of about 30 feet
Easy to install, even for novices
cons: Image isn't as clear in wet conditions

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Picture is pretty clear and does what it supposed to
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Did not work like it stated. Tried so many ways to try to get this to work, dead on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Poor mounting hardware
customer_reviews.text: I found something in my shop that worked with modifications.
customer_reviews.author: Pete Slocum

customer_reviews.title: great little cam for car
customer_reviews.text: This little cam works great as a backup camera with my sound system. Not to difficult to connect.
customer_reviews.author: roadking70

customer_reviews.title: Safely
customer_reviews.text: I love item is great camera to back is nice clear
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Had a broken wire in vehicle I just purchased so bought this unit as replacement. Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Danimal61

customer_reviews.title: Good imaging buutt...
customer_reviews.text: Would have been 5 stars if it had the disable parking guide lines option
customer_reviews.author: DeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Priced right, easy install.
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, and installed easy once you get your car prepped. The good thing I liked about this is that the camera did NOT connect with an RCA plug, but a much smaller one. This enabled me to drill a tiny hole to run the wiring thru the lift gate of my car, rather than a larger RCA hole. Five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Greg L

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Was smaller than expected. But appears to work well so far
customer_reviews.author: Wolf4020

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and waterproof!
customer_reviews.text: Has been waterproof so far over 2 months and picture quality is up to par. Love this.
customer_reviews.author: daniel904

customer_reviews.title: Great Backup Camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great backup camera! Easy to install. Easy to use. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: AJL571

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive Description - Watch Out!
customer_reviews.text: Description from seller says you CAN remove the guidelines by snipping a wire. BUT, when answering a question from someone, the seller says you CAN'T remove them and to buy a different unit. On my unit, there is no wires to cut (unless you have remove the wire's insulation to get to them). Definately deceptive practices here.
customer_reviews.author: WYCowboy911
